name: Firewall (Juan Ignacio González, Dandy, Ailu23, Kailun Cai)
name_original: Firewall (Juan Ignacio González, Dandy, Ailu23, Kailun Cai)
description:
Firewall was developed by Daniel Pérez and Isaac Prieto as main roles in visual design, sound design and level design. Programming by Kailun Cai and Juan Ignacio González. Although we all worked in all aspects of the game.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Left click - Shoot

Right click - Dash

Credits

All the rights for the soundtrack belong to Teknoaxe.

The Nectar and Static fonts from Vladimir Nikolic.
